hook: The small escape-pod found this week has activated itself and is transmitting an encrypted message captioned only by the words “Help Us”.
A new environment generator prototype has been perfected and the corporation that created it is recruiting freelances to install it on prospect terraforming planets.
legendary: A new race with transwarp technology has started dealing with the sworn enemies of the local star system, if they develop it, it could mean the end of the peace treaty.
A mythological space-faring creature feeds on time paradoxes, it will hunt down and devour time-travellers (starship and all), that make a single mistake in the time line.
